content.text: is designed to add billing accounts to an invoice group within a SQL Server database. It handles both single fiscal year and split fiscal year scenarios, updating relevant tables and creating audit logs. The procedure also manages transaction control to ensure data integrity and logs any errors encountered during execution.

The procedure is complex due to its extensive use of conditional logic, multiple table operations, transaction management, and error handling. It also involves dynamic data manipulation and updates across several related tables, which increases its complexity.
